title: Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses, Android TV Smart Glasses with 360" Micro-OLED Display, Google Play, Media Streaming, HDCP Support & Cloud Gaming, Console, Android, iOS, Windows Compatible
descriptions:
Introducing the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses! Immerse yourself in a world of augmented reality with these cutting-edge glasses that are compatible with Android, iOS, and Windows platforms. 

The display features a stunning 360" Micro-OLED screen, providing a truly immersive visual experience. With a weight of just 75g, these glasses are lightweight and comfortable to wear for extended periods.

Enjoy seamless access to your favorite content with the Rokid AR Joy Pack. It supports popular streaming services such as Hulu, Disney+, and Peacock, as well as Google Play. You can also indulge in cloud gaming with the glasses' cloud gaming support.

Your eye comfort is a top priority, which is why these glasses are TüV Rheinland certified. The diopter adjustment range allows for precise customization, ranging from 0.00D to -6.00D.

Connectivity options are versatile, including USB-C, HDMI adapter, and wireless adapter. This ensures easy and convenient connectivity to your devices.

With an operating system of Android TV 12, these glasses offer a seamless and user-friendly interface. HDCP support guarantees secure streaming of copyrighted content.

The Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses are the perfect companion for your augmented reality adventures. Immerse yourself in a world of endless possibilities.

Introducing the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses! Immerse yourself in a whole new world of augmented reality with these cutting-edge glasses. Compatible with Android, iOS, and Windows platforms, these glasses offer a seamless experience across multiple devices.

The display of the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses is truly remarkable. Featuring a 360" Micro-OLED display, you'll be amazed by the stunning visuals and vibrant colors. And with a weight of just 75g, these glasses are lightweight and comfortable to wear for extended periods.

Enjoy access to a wide range of content with these glasses. Stream your favorite shows and movies from popular services like Hulu, Disney+, and Peacock. Plus, with Google Play support, you can access a vast library of apps and games for endless entertainment.

Gaming enthusiasts will be thrilled to know that these glasses support cloud gaming. Immerse yourself in the world of gaming like never before and enjoy seamless gameplay without any lag.

Your eye comfort is a top priority with the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses. These glasses are TüV Rheinland certified, ensuring that your eyes are protected even during long usage. The diopter adjustment range allows you to customize the glasses to your specific vision needs, with a minimum of 0.00D and a maximum of -6.00D.

Connectivity options are also plentiful with these glasses. Utilize the USB-C port, HDMI adapter, or wireless adapter to connect to your devices effortlessly.

Experience the future of augmented reality with the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses. Get yours today and take your entertainment and gaming to new heights!

Connectivity options are plentiful with the Rokid AR Joy Pack. It features USB-C, HDMI adapter, and wireless adapter capabilities, allowing you to easily connect to various devices and accessories.
